The hackathon is held in the museum x.

Address

Badisches Landesmuseum - Museum am Markt
Karl-Friedrich-Straße
76133 Karlsruhe
Germany

Getting there

Take a tram to the station "Marktplatz". The museum x is only a couple of meters away from there. Tram schedules can be found here.
